learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate knowledge of the specific topic area.

assessments.weighting: <dd>100% 100% total divided into different types of assessments, as will be specified by the supervising staff member </dd>
assessments.due_date: Due dates will be advised by the supervising staff member.
assessments.category: Paper/ Report/ Annotation, Essay/ Critique, Project
assessments.task_description:
Assessments will be specified by the supervising staff member.

Assessment items may include the following: assignments, literature surveys, seminars, exams, etc.

The assessment items within the "Independent Study" Assessment will be such that none will exceed 60% of the 100% mark, and at least one will be identity verified.
assessments.submission_guidelines: To be advised by the supervising staff member.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.
assessments.additional_info: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.
